# Enterprise Angular Application - Project Instructions

This is an enterprise-ready Angular application following best practices and modern architecture patterns.

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Angular project structure
- [x] Setup core module and configuration
- [x] Setup shared module and components
- [x] Setup NgRx state management
- [x] Setup authentication module
- [x] Configure routing and lazy loading
- [x] Setup testing configuration
- [x] Configure linting and formatting
- [x] Setup Docker and CI/CD
- [x] Install dependencies and compile
- [x] Create documentation

## Architecture Overview

- **Core Module**: Singleton services, interceptors, guards
- **Shared Module**: Reusable components, pipes, directives
- **Feature Modules**: Lazy-loaded business features
- **State Management**: NgRx with effects and selectors
- **Authentication**: JWT-based with token refresh
- **Testing**: Jest with comprehensive test coverage
- **Code Quality**: ESLint, Prettier, Husky pre-commit hooks
